activities: IFF processes EEA and Swiss personal data relating to (1) employees of International Flavors & Fragrances, Inc.'s subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland for purposes of global HR administration and management, as a data controller; and (2) individual representatives of actual and prospective corporate customers, distributors, suppliers and other business partners in the EEA and Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-Line, HR data which includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: EEA Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
